item.description:
Anzac Day rememberance service hosted by the American Australian Association.

Please join us as for our annual ANZAC Day Remembrance Service as we honour those who have served our countries in times of war.

Where: Emmanuel Church, Newbury Street, Boston
When: 3:00pm for the Service with a reception to follow
Officiating Clergy: Father Ronald Anderson, SJ

Light refreshments, including Pies and Pasties courtesy of ozE Pies and wine kindly donated from New Zealand Winegrowers, will be served following the service. In addition, we invite you to bring along a dessert or sandwich plate to share.

If you would like to volunteer to assist with this event please contact Helen at 617-491-0708.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Anzac Day
